SEARCH
Package controller.interfaces

Interface MedicalRecordService

All Known Implementing Classes:
MedicalRecordController
public interface MedicalRecordService
Interface for managing medical records of patients.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addDiagnosis(String patientId, String diagnosis, String treatment)
    Adds a new diagnosis entry to a patient's medical record.
    List<Diagnosis>
    getDiagnosisHistory(String patientId)
    Retrieves the history of diagnoses for a specific patient.
    MedicalRecord
    getMedicalRecord(String patientId)
    Retrieves the medical record for a specific patient.
    void
    updateContactInfo(String patientId, String phone, String email)
    Updates the contact information (phone and email) for a specific patient.

  • Method Details

    • getMedicalRecord

      MedicalRecord getMedicalRecord(String patientId)
      Retrieves the medical record for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient whose medical record is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The MedicalRecord object associated with the given patient ID.

    • updateContactInfo

      void updateContactInfo(String patientId, String phone, String email)
      Updates the contact information (phone and email) for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient whose contact information is being updated.
      phone - The new phone number for the patient.
      email - The new email address for the patient.

    • addDiagnosis

      void addDiagnosis(String patientId, String diagnosis, String treatment)
      Adds a new diagnosis entry to a patient's medical record.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient to whom the diagnosis is being added.
      diagnosis - The diagnosis description for the patient.
      treatment - The prescribed treatment for the diagnosis.

    • getDiagnosisHistory

      List<Diagnosis> getDiagnosisHistory(String patientId)
      Retrieves the history of diagnoses for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient whose diagnosis history is being retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Diagnosis objects representing the patient's past diagnoses.
